Every 3rd attack deals @Damage@ magic damage and @MRShred@% Shreds @1StarBounces@ enemies for @MRShredDuration@ seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

data.desc:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their maximum Health. Executions have a 40% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
data.name: Gold Collector

org.desc:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below @ExecutePercent@% of their maximum Health. Executions have a @GoldChance@% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

data.desc:
Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 20% of damage dealt.

Ally Healing: 0
data.name: Hextech Gunblade

org.desc:
Heal the lowest percent Health ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt.

Ally Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@

data.desc:
Place on a Tier 1, 2, or 3 champion to transfer them to your partner. Any items held will pop off.

Once used, this item regenerates in 5 rounds. At 4-1 it upgrades into a Rune of Allegiance.

[Cannot be used in combat.]
[CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]
data.name: Lesser Rune of Allegiance

org.desc:
Place on a Tier 1, 2, or 3 champion to transfer them to your partner. Any items held will pop off.

Once used, this item regenerates in @RoundsToRegain@ rounds. At 4-1 it upgrades into a Rune of Allegiance.

[Cannot be used in combat.]
[CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]
